A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the Last Jedi continues the adventures of Rey\, Finn and Kylo Ren\, the characters set up in The Force Awakens. It is a wonderful middle chapter that was entertaining from start to finish and introduced us to an expanded vision of what the Force actually is. I’m looking forward to the conclusion of this current saga and am interested in what (Director) Rian Johnson has in store for the next trilogy.
